parameters.name: ReceptionInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the destination instance.

parameters.name: ReceptionInstanceOwner
parameters.description: The tenant to which the route receiving instance belongs.

parameters.name: ReceptionInstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of the destination instance. Valid values:

*   **VPD**: Lingjun network segment.
*   **VCC**: Lingjun Connection.

parameters.name: RouteMapAction
parameters.description:
Policy behavior; optional values:

*   **permit**: Allow
*   **deny**: Rejected

parameters.name: RouteMapNum
parameters.description:
The ID of the policy.

A smaller sequence number indicates a lower priority. When a route is matched, a policy with a higher priority is preferentially matched.

**Valid values: 1001 to 2000**

parameters.name: TransmissionInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the source instance.

parameters.name: TransmissionInstanceOwner
parameters.description: The tenant to which the route publish instance belongs

parameters.name: TransmissionInstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of the source instance. Valid values:

*   **VPD**: Lingjun network segment.
*   **VCC**: Lingjun Connection.
